XmlUI:
<!-- include Main -->
<Canvas raycastTarget="false">
  <Defaults>
    <Button color="#828282"/>
    <Button class="ini" color="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95)" textColor="rgb(1, 1, 1)" fontSize="16"/>
    <Button class="interface" color="#828282" textColor="#141414" font="Fonts/PirataOne" fontSize="20"/>
    <Button class="interfaceInverse" color="#141414" textColor="#828282" font="Fonts/PirataOne" fontSize="20"/>

    <Image preserveAspect="true"/>

    <Text class="gloom" font="Fonts/PirataOne" fontSize="18" color="#9e846a" alignment="MiddleCenter"/>
    <Text class="interface" font="Fonts/PirataOne" fontSize="20" alignment="MiddleCenter"/>
    <Text class="interfaceInverse" font="Fonts/PirataOne" color="Grey" fontSize="20" alignment="MiddleCenter"/>

    <Panel class="drag" allowDragging="true" restrictDraggingToParentBounds="false"
           returnToOriginalPositionWhenReleased="false"/>
  </Defaults>

  <Button id="showButtons" onClick="showButtons" width="23" height="25" text="▲" fontSize="12"
          rectAlignment="UpperRight" offsetXY="-414 0"/>

  <VerticalLayout id="buttons" padding="0 0 0 20" rectAlignment="UpperRight" offsetXY="-250 0" height="270" width="164">
    <Button class="interface" text="Player Interface" onClick="showBI"/>
    <Button class="interface" text="Enemy Interface" onClick="showMI"/>
    <Button id="showSpawner" class="interface" text="Game Setup" onClick="spawnerClicked"/>
    <Button id="showOptions" class="interface" text="Options" onClick="onShowOptionsClicked"/>
    <Button id="showCamControls" class="interface" text="Camera Controls" onClick="cameraControls"/>
    <Button id="showShopUi" class="interface" text="Item Shop" onClick="onShowItemShop"/>
  </VerticalLayout>

  <!-- include ui/CameraControl -->
  <Panel id="CameraControl"
         visibility="false"
         height="140" width="170"
         rectAlignment="UpperRight" offsetXY="-250 -245"
         allowDragging="true" returnToOriginalPositionWhenReleased="false"
         showAnimation="FadeIn" hideAnimation="FadeOut" animationDuration="5"
         color="rgba(0,0,0,0.95)"
         padding="10 10 10 10">
    <VerticalLayout spacing="1">
      <Button height="40" width="150" offsetXY="0 150" fontStyle="Bold" fontSize="18"
              onClick="cameraPosition(showScenarioBoard)">
        <Text class="interface" text="Scenario"/>
      </Button>
      <Button height="40" width="150" offsetXY="0 110" fontStyle="Bold" fontSize="18"
              onClick="cameraPosition(showGameBoard)">
        <Text class="interface" text="Play Area"/>
      </Button>
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="1">
        <Button onClick="cameraPosition(One)">
          <Text class="interface" text="1"/>
        </Button>
        <Button onClick="cameraPosition(Two)">
          <Text class="interface" text="2"/>
        </Button>
        <Button onClick="cameraPosition(Three)">
          <Text class="interface" text="3"/>
        </Button>
        <Button onClick="cameraPosition(Four)">
          <Text class="interface" text="4"/>
        </Button>
      </HorizontalLayout>
    </VerticalLayout>
  </Panel>

  <!-- include ui/CameraControl -->
  <!-- include ui/Shop -->
  <Panel id="shop.window" class="drag"
         offsetXY="480 -70"
         width="260" height="500"
         color="#0E0E0E"
         active="false"
         rectAlignment="UpperCenter">
    <Defaults>
      <Text class="shop.text"
            color="#9E846A"
            font="Fonts/PirataOne" fontSize="20"
            rectAlignment="UpperCenter"/>
      <Button class="shop.button"
              width="90%" height="50"
              image="element.dropdown"
              textColor="#9E846A"
              font="Fonts/PirataOne" fontSize="30"
              rectAlignment="UpperCenter"/>
      <Dropdown class="shop.dropdown"
                width="100%" height="40"
                color="#2E2E2E" textColor="#9E846A"
                itemBackgroundColors="#2E2E2E|#2E2E0E|#2E2E0E|#2E2E0E" itemTextColor="#9E846A"
                checkColor="#9E846A" arrowColor="#9E846A"
                font="Fonts/PirataOne" fontSize="20"
                rectAlignment="UpperCenter"/>
      <InputField class="shop.input"
                  width="100%" height="50"
                  color="#2E2E2E" textColor="#9E846A"
                  font="Fonts/PirataOne" fontSize="25"/>
      <Image class="shop.button"
             width="100%" height="50"
             image="element.dropdown"
             rectAlignment="UpperCenter"/>
      <Panel class="shop.panel"
             width="90%" height="80"
             offsetXY="0 0" rectAlignment="UpperCenter"/>
    </Defaults>
  
    <Panel id="shop.header" offsetXY="0 0" height="50" rectAlignment="UpperLeft">
      <Text class="shop.text" text="Item Shop" fontSize="25"/>
      <Button class="interface" text="X" width="30" height="90%" rectAlignment="UpperRight"
              onClick="onCloseShopWindowClicked"/>
    </Panel>
  
    <Panel id="shop.content" offsetXY="0 -50" rectAlignment="UpperLeft">
      <Panel id="shop.group" class="shop.panel">
        <Text class="shop.text" text="Groups By" offsetXY="0 20"/>
        <Dropdown class="shop.dropdown" offsetXY="0 -40" onValueChanged="onGroupByChanged">
          <Option selected="true">Type</Option>
          <Option>None</Option>
        </Dropdown>
      </Panel>
  
      <Panel id="shop.sort" class="shop.panel" offsetXY="0 -90">
        <Text class="shop.text" text="Sort By" offsetXY="0 20"/>
        <Dropdown class="shop.dropdown" offsetXY="0 -40" onValueChanged="onSortByChanged">
          <Option selected="true">Name</Option>
          <Option>Item number</Option>
          <Option>Cost</Option>
        </Dropdown>
      </Panel>
  
      <Image class="shop.button" offsetXY="0 -200" onClick="onSortClicked">
        <Text class="shop.text" text="Sort"/>
      </Image>
  
      <Panel id="shop.filter" class="shop.panel" offsetXY="0 -260">
        <Text class="shop.text" text="Filter"/>
        <InputField id="shop.filter.input" class="shop.input" placeholder="Enter part of item name..." offsetXY="0 -50"
                    onEndEdit="onFilterEntered"/>
        <Image class="shop.button" offsetXY="0 -120" onClick="onClearFilterClicked">
          <Text class="shop.text" text="Clear Filter"/>
        </Image>
      </Panel>
    </Panel>
  </Panel>

  <!-- include ui/Shop -->

  <Panel id="iniList" class="drag" active="true"
         rectAlignment="UpperLeft" offsetXY="100 0" height="35" width="310"
         color="#FFFFFF00"
         visibility="Red|White|Blue|Green|Black"
         showAnimation="SlideIn_Top" hideAnimation="SlideOut_Top" animationDuration="1">
    <Button class="interface" text="Initiative Tracker" height="35" width="310" rectAlignment="UpperLeft" offsetXY="0"
            onClick="showIni"/>
    <!-- include InitiativeTracker.xml -->
    <VerticalLayout id="InitiativeRows" padding="5 5 5 5" spacing="5" offsetXY="0 -40">
      <HorizontalLayout id="Initiative_1" active="false">
        <Button id="InitiativeButton_1" class="ini" textColor="#FFFFFF" onClick="MarkInitiative" minWidth="250"
                preferredWidth="300" text="Test"/>
        <Button id="HideInitiative_1" class="ini" textColor="#FFFFFF" onClick="HideInitiative" minWidth="25" text="+"/>
        <Button id="MonsterAbilityCard_1" class="ini" textColor="#FFFFFF" onClick="getMonsterAC" minWidth="25" text=">"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <HorizontalLayout id="Initiative_2" active="false">
        <Button id="InitiativeButton_2" class="ini" textColor="#FFFFFF" onClick="MarkInitiative" minWidth="250"
                preferredWidth="300" text="Test"/>
        <Button id="HideInitiative_2" class="ini" textColor="#FFFFFF" onClick="HideInitiative" minWidth="25" text="+"/>
        <Button id="MonsterAbilityCard_2" class="ini" textColor="#FFFFFF" onClick="getMonsterAC" minWidth="25" text=">"/>

    <!-- include InitiativeTracker.xml -->

    <Panel id="MonsterAbilityCard" class="drag" active="false"
           rectAlignment="UpperLeft" offsetXY="310 -40" padding="10 10 10 10" height="180" width="250"
           color="rgba(0,0,0,0.95)">
      <Text id="MACText" font="Fonts/MarkaziGloom" color="rgb(1, 1, 1)" resizeTextForBestFit="true"/>
    </Panel>

    <Panel id="monster-ability-area-1" class="drag" active="false"
           rectAlignment="UpperLeft" offsetXY="560 -40" height="160" width="100"
           color="rgba(0,0,0,0.95)">
      <Defaults>
        <Text fontSize="20" font="Fonts/MarkaziGloom" alignment="MiddleLeft" rectAlignment="UpperLeft"/>
      </Defaults>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-1-1" offsetXY="0 40" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-1-2" offsetXY="12 20" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-1-3" offsetXY="0 0" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-1-4" offsetXY="12 -20" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-1-5" offsetXY="0 -40" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-1-6" offsetXY="12 -60" active="false"/>
    </Panel>

    <Panel id="monster-ability-area-2" class="drag" active="false"
           rectAlignment="UpperLeft" offsetXY="660 -40" height="160" width="100"
           color="rgba(0,0,0,0.95)">
      <Defaults>
        <Text fontSize="20" font="Fonts/MarkaziGloom" alignment="MiddleLeft" rectAlignment="UpperLeft"/>
      </Defaults>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-2-1" offsetXY="0 40" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-2-2" offsetXY="12 20" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-2-3" offsetXY="0 0" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-2-4" offsetXY="12 -20" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-2-5" offsetXY="0 -40" active="false"/>
      <Text id="monster-ability-area-2-6" offsetXY="12 -60" active="false"/>
    </Panel>
  </Panel>

  <!-- include ui/MonsterInterface -->
  <Panel
    id="MonsterInterface"
    class="drag"
    height="165" width="270"
    rectAlignment="LowerRight" offsetXY="0 255"
    active="false"
    color="rgba(0,0,0,0.95)"
    showAnimation="SlideIn_Right" hideAnimation="None" animationDuration="1">
    <VerticalLayout padding="10 10 0 10" spacing="10">
      <Text class="interfaceInverse" text="Enemy Interface" fontSize="26" ignoreLayout="true" width="270"
            offsetXY="0 50" alignment="MiddleCenter"/>
      <Text/>
      <Button class="interface" text="Draw Modifier" onClick="drawClickedEnemy"/>
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="5">
        <Button class="interface" text="Add Curse" onClick="addCurseEnemy"/>
        <Button class="interface" text="Add Bless" onClick="addBlessEnemy"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
    </VerticalLayout>
  </Panel>

  <!-- include ui/MonsterInterface -->
  <!-- include ui/PlayerInterface -->
  <Panel
    id="PlayerInterface"
    class="drag"
    height="300" width="270"
    active="false"
    color="rgba(0,0,0,0.95)"
    rectAlignment="UpperRight" offsetXY="0 -255"
    showAnimation="SlideIn_Right" hideAnimation="None" animationDuration="1">
    <VerticalLayout padding="10 10 0 40" spacing="10">
      <Text class="interfaceInverse" text="Player Interface" fontSize="26" ignoreLayout="true" width="270"
            offsetXY="0 115" alignment="MiddleCenter"/>
      <Text/>
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="5">
        <Button class="interface" text="Start Round" onClick="reveal"/>
        <Button class="interface" text="End Round" onClick="endRound"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <Button class="interface" text="Draw Attack Modifier" onClick="drawClicked"/>
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="5">
        <Button class="interface" text="Add Curse" onClick="addCurse"/>
        <Button class="interface" text="Add Bless" onClick="addBless"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="5">
        <Button class="interface" text="Sort Hand" onClick="sortHand"/>
        <Button class="interface" text="Long Rest" onClick="longRest"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
    </VerticalLayout>
    <TableLayout offsetXY="0 -127" height="20" width="240" columnWidths="20 100" cellBackgroundColor="clear">
      <Row>
        <Cell>
          <Button onClick="showSolo" id="soloToggle"/>
        </Cell>
        <Cell>
          <Image image="Solo Mode"/>
        </Cell>
      </Row>
    </TableLayout>
  </Panel>

  <!-- include ui/PlayerInterface -->
  <!-- include ui/SoloInterface -->
  <Panel
    id="SoloInterface"
    height="550"
    width="270"
    rectAlignment="MiddleRight"
    active="false"
    offsetXY="0 255"
    color="rgba(0,0,0,0.95)"
    showAnimation="SlideIn_Right"
    hideAnimation="None"
    animationDuration="1"
    allowDragging="true"
    returnToOriginalPositionWhenReleased="false">
    <VerticalLayout padding="10 10 0 40" spacing="10" childForceExpandHeight="false">
      <Text class="interfaceInverse" id="BIImage" text="Solo Interface" fontSize="26" ignoreLayout="true" width="270"
            offsetXY="0 247" alignment="MiddleCenter"/>
      <Text minheight="50"/>
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
        <Button class="interface" text="Start Round" onClick="reveal"/>
        <Button class="interface" text="End Round" onClick="endRound"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <VerticalLayout padding="0 0 10 0" id="P1" active="true">
        <Button class="interface" text="Draw Attack Modifier P1" minheight="35" maxheight="35" onClick="drawClicked"
                id="Red"/>
        <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
          <Button class="interface" text="Add Curse" onClick="addCurse" id="Red"/>
          <Button class="interface" text="Add Bless" onClick="addBless" id="Red"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
        <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
          <Button class="interface" text="Sort Hand" onClick="sortHand" id="Red"/>
          <Button class="interface" text="Long Rest" onClick="longRest" id="Red"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </VerticalLayout>
      <VerticalLayout padding="0 0 10 0" id="P2" active="true">
        <Button class="interface" text="Draw Attack Modifier P2" minheight="35" maxheight="35" onClick="drawClicked"
                id="White"/>
        <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
          <Button class="interface" text="Add Curse" onClick="addCurse" id="White"/>
          <Button class="interface" text="Add Bless" onClick="addBless" id="White"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
        <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
          <Button class="interface" text="Sort Hand" onClick="sortHand" id="White"/>
          <Button class="interface" text="Long Rest" onClick="longRest" id="White"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </VerticalLayout>
      <VerticalLayout padding="0 0 10 0" id="P3" active="true">
        <Button class="interface" text="Draw Attack Modifier P3" minheight="35" maxheight="35" onClick="drawClicked"
                id="Blue"/>
        <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
          <Button class="interface" text="Add Curse" onClick="addCurse" id="Blue"/>
          <Button class="interface" text="Add Bless" onClick="addBless" id="Blue"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
        <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
          <Button class="interface" text="Sort Hand" onClick="sortHand" id="Blue"/>
          <Button class="interface" text="Long Rest" onClick="longRest" id="Blue"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </VerticalLayout>
      <VerticalLayout padding="0 0 10 0" id="P4" active="true">
        <Button class="interface" text="Draw Attack Modifier P4" minheight="35" maxheight="35" onClick="drawClicked"
                id="Green"/>
        <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
          <Button class="interface" text="Add Curse" onClick="addCurse" id="Green"/>
          <Button class="interface" text="Add Bless" onClick="addBless" id="Green"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
        <HorizontalLayout spacing="5" minheight="35" maxheight="35">
          <Button class="interface" text="Sort Hand" onClick="sortHand" id="Green"/>
          <Button class="interface" text="Long Rest" onClick="longRest" id="Green"/>
        </HorizontalLayout>
      </VerticalLayout>
    </VerticalLayout>
    <TableLayout id="tableSolo" offsetXY="0 -253" height="20" width="240" columnWidths="20 100 20 130"
                 cellBackgroundColor="clear">
      <Row>
        <Cell>
          <Button onClick="showSolo" id="soloToggle">
            <Image image="Checkmark"/>
          </Button>
        </Cell>
        <Cell>
          <Image image="Solo Mode"/>
        </Cell>
      </Row>
    </TableLayout>
  </Panel>

  <!-- include ui/SoloInterface -->

  <!-- include ui/GameSetup -->
  <Panel id="Spawner" height="800" width="550" color="#000000F0" allowDragging="true"
         returnToOriginalPositionWhenReleased="false" showAnimation="FadeIn" hideAnimation="FadeOut"
         animationDuration="1" active="false">

    <!-- include ScenarioSetup -->
    <Panel id="ScenarioSpawner" height="800" width="550" color="#00000000" rectAlignment="LowerCenter" active="true">
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="10" offsetXY="0 -25" width="500" height="50" rectAlignment="UpperCenter">
        <Button class="interface" text="Scenario Setup" id="ScenarioMS" onClick="spawnerClicked" color="#828282"
                minWidth="210"/>
        <Button class="interfaceInverse" text="Monster Setup" id="SingleMS" onClick="spawnerClicked" color="#141414"
                minWidth="210"/>
        <Button class="interface" text="X" id="CloseSpawner" onClick="spawnerClicked" fontSize="30" width="50"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <Button id="HiddenRooms1" width="25" height="25" offsetXY="-190 280" color="#00000000" onClick="toggleChange(2)">
        <Image id="HiddenRooms1Image" image="Radio Button Selected"/>
      </Button>
      <Text class="interfaceInverse" width="550" text="Hidden Rooms" offsetXY="-100 280"/>
      <Button id="HiddenRooms2" width="25" height="25" offsetXY="40 280" color="#00000000" onClick="toggleChange(1)">
        <Image id="HiddenRooms2Image" image="Radio Button"/>
      </Button>
      <Text class="interfaceInverse" width="550" text="Revealed Rooms" offsetXY="130 280"/>
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="10" offsetXY="0 -200" width="500" height="50" rectAlignment="UpperCenter">
        <Button id="syncScenarios" class="interfaceInverse" text="Refresh Scenario List" fontSize="36"
                onClick="syncScenarios"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <VerticalScrollView offsetXY="0 -35" width="500" height="300" color="#00000000"
                          horizontalScrollbarVisibility="AutoHideAndExpandViewport"
                          scrollSensitivity="30">
        <VerticalLayout id="scenarioList" spacing="5"/>
      </VerticalScrollView>
      <HorizontalLayout offsetXY="0 -250" height="50" width="225" spacing="10">
        <Button class="interface" text="Delete Map" onClick="7ef9dd/checkArea"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <HorizontalLayout offsetXY="0 -330" height="50" width="450" spacing="10">
        <Button id="win" class="interface" text="Scenario Won" onClick="spawnerClicked"/>
        <Button id="lost" class="interface" text="Scenario Lost" onClick="spawnerClicked"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
    </Panel>

    <!-- include ScenarioSetup -->
    <!-- include MonsterSetup -->
    <Panel id="MonsterSpawner" height="800" width="550" color="#00000000" rectAlignment="LowerCenter" active="false">
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="10" offsetXY="0 -25" width="500" height="50" rectAlignment="UpperCenter">
        <Button id="ScenarioMS" class="interfaceInverse" text="ScenarioSetup" onClick="spawnerClicked" minWidth="210"/>
        <Button id="SingleMS" class="interface" text="Monster Setup" onClick="spawnerClicked" color="#828282"
                minWidth="210"/>
        <Button id="CloseSpawner" class="interface" text="X" onClick="spawnerClicked" fontSize="30" width="50"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <Text class="interfaceInverse" fontSize="24" offsetXY="0 280" text="Scenario Level"/>
      <Slider id="MSSlider" position="-50 240" minValue="-1" maxValue="7" value="-1"
              wholeNumbers="true" onValueChanged="updateSliderValue"/>
      <Text id="MSSLevel" class="interfaceInverse" position="100 240" fontSize="36" text="Auto"/>
      <Button id="isElite" isOn="false" onClick="toggleChange" width="25" height="25" offsetXY="-20 180">
        <Image id="isEliteImage" active="false" image="Checkmark"/>
      </Button>
      <Text class="interfaceInverse" fontSize="24" text="Elite" width="550" offsetXY="20 180"/>
      <HorizontalLayout spacing="10" offsetXY="0 -250" width="500" height="50" rectAlignment="UpperCenter">
        <Button id="syncMonsters" class="interfaceInverse" text="Refresh Monster List" fontSize="36"
                onClick="syncMonsters"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
      <VerticalScrollView offsetXY="0 -75" width="500" height="300" color="#00000000"
                          horizontalScrollbarVisibility="AutoHideAndExpandViewport"
                          scrollSensitivity="30">
        <VerticalLayout id="monsterList" spacing="5"/>
      </VerticalScrollView>
      <HorizontalLayout offsetXY="0 -330" height="50" width="225" spacing="10">
        <Button class="interface" text="Delete Monsters" onClick="7ef9dd/cleanMonster"/>
      </HorizontalLayout>
    </Panel>

    <!-- include MonsterSetup -->
  </Panel>

  <!-- include ui/GameSetup -->

  <Panel id="clearAreaYN" width="800" height="100" color="#141414" active="false" allowDragging="true"
         returnToOriginalPositionWhenReleased="false" outline="#141414" outlineSize="30 30">
    <VerticalLayout spacing="20">
      <Image image="Want Delete"/>
      <HorizontalLayout minheight="40" spacing="15" padding="100 100 0 0">
        <Button onClick="7ef9dd/cleanArea">
          <Image image="Yes"/>
        </Button>
        <Button onClick="7ef9dd/NoClicked">
          <Image image="No"/>
        </Button>
      </HorizontalLayout>
    </VerticalLayout>
  </Panel>

  <Panel id="clearPlayAreaYN" width="800" height="100" color="#141414" active="false" allowDragging="true"
         returnToOriginalPositionWhenReleased="false" outline="#141414" outlineSize="30 30">
    <VerticalLayout spacing="20">
      <Image image="Want Delete"/>
      <HorizontalLayout minheight="40" spacing="15" padding="100 100 0 0">
        <Button onClick="3054ae/cleanArea">
          <Image image="Yes"/>
        </Button>
        <Button onClick="3054ae/NoClicked">
          <Image image="No"/>
        </Button>
      </HorizontalLayout>
    </VerticalLayout>
  </Panel>
</Canvas>

<!-- include Main -->
